Welcome to covid-19-dashboard’s documentation!¶

This module performs:

-Mapps the index with functionality -Allows the user to schedule updates -Allows the user to cancel updates -Allows thhe user to remove news articles

user_interface.index()¶

Checks to see if the user has performed any actions such as: submiting an update, removing an update, removing a news story

Returns

The rendered template with embedded data

This module performs:

-the sheduliong of covid updates -calculating seconds left until time given -covid data API

covid_data_handler.covid_API_request(location='Exeter', location_type='ltla')¶

Using API to get current covid statistics for a certain location

Parameters

  • location – The location name, stored in the config file

  • location_type – Type of location, stored in the config file

Returns

Covid data for the location as a dictionary

covid_data_handler.parse_csv_data(csv_filename=<class 'str'>)¶

Extract csv file and transfrom it

Parameters

csv_filename – name of the csv file

Returns

list of strings

covid_data_handler.process_covid_csv_data(covid_csv_data)¶

Processes the returned data from parse_csv_data

Parameters

covid_csv_data – The list with covid data

Returns

tuple with (the number of cases in the laste 7 days,

the number of hospital cases, the cumulative number of deaths)

covid_data_handler.schedule_covid_updates(update_interval, update_name, type='non-repeating')¶

Schedules covid updates so the covid data in the dashboard updates

Parameters

  • update_interval – the time in which the update should happen

  • update_name – the name of the update

  • type – repeating or non-repeating update, deafult is non-repeating

covid_data_handler.second_calculator(hour_minute)¶

Function used to calculate the seconds until the time given in the format HH:MM(hours and minutes) :parameter hour_minute: The time that will be calculated :return: The seconds left until the time entered as an integer

This module performs:

-extracting news articles from an API -updates the news displayed on the dashboard -scheduling updates for the news

covid_news_handling.news_API_request(covid_terms='Covid COVID-19 coronavirus')¶

This function uses an API to retrieve news articles with the relevant terms currently these terms are accesssed from the config file :param covid_terms: string with key words :return: the news articles exracted from the API

covid_news_handling.schedule_news_updates(update_interval, update_name, type='non-repeating')¶

Schedules news updates so the covid data in the dashboard updates

Parameters

  • update_interval – the time in which the update should happen

  • update_name – the name of the update

  • type – repeating or non-repeating update, deafult is non-repeating
